project.title: KPMG Careers

relatedLinks.title: Eli Paris
relatedLinks.intro: Eli Paris jewelry store website built with Angular, Node and Strapi. Complete back office to manage the content of the site. Cart, payment and invoice processes.
chall: Integration development from InVision designs to Angular and Sass
Used some Prime NG components from the library
CSS from scratch with Sass leveraging Grids and Multi-columns layouts
